title: SOLVED: A1706 820-00239 - USBC's not detecting USB nor providing Video Output, but charging - Liquid Damaged
message:
A1706 820-00239 which had extensive liquid damage.
Located and removed the short on PPBUS_G3H. Now turns on, charging and works fine. Passes Apple Diagnostic. The only issue seems to be not USB and HDMI output via either of USBCs. No light on a USB drive.

Tried SMC reset. Another strange thing is when I do a PRAM reset, I can see the screen flashing for it, but no chime sound. Can't remember if this one had a chime sound or not.

Haven't worked on USB/Video via USBC's before. Where do I look first?

title: SOLVED: A1706 820-00239 - USBC's not detecting USB nor providing Video Output, but charging - Liquid Damaged
message:
Check for voltage at L3500 and LB700, when connect USB device to corresponding port.
Compare diode mode reading with known good similar board.
Also check R3501/06 and RB701/06.

title: SOLVED: A1706 820-00239 - USBC's not detecting USB nor providing Video Output, but charging - Liquid Damaged
message:
End up being shorted PP5V_S4. Shocking how it was turning on and functioning with shorted S4 rail. 

Replaced UB700 as it had short on PVCC line. R3501/6 measured fine but had little dots on top. Replaced in case. 

Thanks again
